assets

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • assets.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Background, Bullet, Coin, Danger, Heart, Obstacle, Player, Powerup, Shooter

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to create all the sprites in this program.
